20110113023537.000|20110113023539.000|CC1|THE SHOOTING, THE SUSPECT, JARED

20110113023541.000|20110113023543.000|CC1|WAL-MART AND BOUGHT BULLETS.

20110113023544.000|20110113023545.000|CC1|RUNNING A RED LIGHT NEAR THIS

20110113023554.000|20110113023555.000|CC1|AUTHORITIES SAY HE SHOT 19      
20110113023555.000|20110113023558.000|CC1|PEOPLE, KILLING SIX.

20110113023606.000|20110113023607.000|CC1|A FORM LETTER FROM CONGRESSWOMAN
20110113023607.000|20110113023608.000|CC1|GIFFORDS' OFFICE IN A LOCK BOX

20110113023616.000|20110113023617.000|CC1|WAS PRETTY CLEAR WHO COMMITTED

20110113023630.000|20110113023633.000|CC1|JARED RAN OFF INTO THE DESERT.  
20110113023633.000|20110113023635.000|CC1|>> Reporter: MEANWHILE, FAMILIES
20110113023635.000|20110113023635.000|CC1|OF THE INJURED ARE STILL WAITING
20110113023635.000|20110113023638.000|CC1|AND PRAYING.                    
20110113023638.000|20110113023639.000|CC1|>> DAY BY DAY HE HAS TO HEAL AND
20110113023639.000|20110113023640.000|CC1|IT'S GOING TO TAKE A LONG TIME  
20110113023640.000|20110113023641.000|CC1|TO HEAL.
